sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Japanese boxwood (Buxus microphylla var. japonica 'National') is an amazing evergreen shrub that's perfect for both formal and informal gardens. Its dense foliage and low growth habit make it an ideal choice for creating a classic, trimmed hedge. Its lush green leaves and arching branches make it attractive even without pruning and trimming. It's hardy and tolerant of a wide range of conditions, able to thrive in full sun or part shade. It has relatively low maintenance needs, needing occasional pruning and regular watering. Its versatile, easy to manage, and stunning to look at, making it an excellent addition to any garden.
